name: Beach Bonanza
description:
Play games, and earn GP! Spend GP to unlock doors, games, collectibles, and even more within the island! With so much to do, see, and collect, we hope you enjoy your stay at Beach Bonanza!

Features:


- Collectible Cards!
- Some of the Hottest Music in gaming!
- 6 Different Playable Characters!
- Interesting People!
- Mutli Themed Maps (for a few games)!
- All the Gp you can carry!
- Sub-quests?
- Secrets?
- MORE?!?!?!

Move around with the "ARROW KEYS",  Interact/Action with "Z or ENTER",  Access the menu or cancel with "X",  Sprint with "SHIFT"

Volume CAN ONLY be adjusted through your "Volume Mixer" in Windows

Fullscreen can be enabled by launching the game, pressing F1 when loaded, check marking the "Launch in Fullscreen" option, then reloading.
